titles.title: Recognizing the American Highway Users Alliance on the occasion of its 75th anniversary, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee on Highways and Transit Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 110-453.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 159.

action.text: Mr. DeFazio moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 772.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/22/2008--Passed House without amendment. Recognizes the American Highway Users Alliance on its 75th anniversary. Commends its many achievements and encourages it to continue its tradition of excellence in service to motorists and the transportation industry.
